entry.title: 使用VBA输出UTF-8
entry.content:
输出utf-8Public Function writeOut(cText As String, file As String) As Integer    On Error GoTo errHandler    Dim fsT    'Create Stream object    Set fsT = CreateObject("ADODB.Stream")    'Specify stream type - we want To save text/string data.    fsT.Type = 2    'Specify charset For the source text data.    fsT.Charset = "utf-8"    'Open the stream And write binary data To the object    fsT.Open    fsT.writetext cText    'Save binary data To disk    fsT.SaveToFile file, 2    GoTo finisherrHandler:    MsgBox (Err.Description)    writeOut = 0    Exit Functionfinish:    writeOut = 1End Function

调用方法 Call writeOut(datastr, filePath)

参考网址: https://gist.github.com/JoBrad/1023484
